text: Richard Ramsbottom (1749–1813) was a British Tory politician, MP for New Windsor from 1806 until 1810, when he was succeeded by his nephew, John Ramsbottom. He lived at Clewer Cottage, near Windsor, Berkshire. ==References== Category:Members of the Parliament of the United Kingdom for constituencies in Berkshire Category:People from Windsor, Berkshire Category:1749 births Category:1813 deaths Category:UK MPs 1806–1807 Category:UK MPs 1807–1812
title: Richard Ramsbottom
